name: Stranger Movies
description:
Description

Stranger Movies is a coop board game where little scouts have to recruit movie heroes to fight back strange monsters.

The monster waves are coming endlessly, find the right hero to fight the monster, then send them using the fire camp.

This game is designed to be played with a special interactive board, or a simple one. Check the how to play for more informations.

How to play

Complete installation / instruction manual here
